movies.title: Støv på hjernen
movies.plot: Randi Svendsen is happy. Her everyday life is about keeping windows, floors, and clothes cleaner than the neighbour's. Randi's friend Edna however got a different view on the values of life: "don't clean your husband out of the house and into the arms of the secretary". Unfortunately this is already about to happen in the Svendsen-family. Thougb it's not the secretary it's the young widow upstairs. What can Randi do to prevent the unthinkable? Can the "Union for radical housewives" be the solution?
movies.simplePlot: Randi Svendsen is happy. Her everyday life is about keeping windows, floors, and clothes cleaner than the neighbour's. Randi's friend Edna however got a different view on the values of life...

biography.bio: Inger Marie Andersen was born on November 25, 1930 in Norway. She was an actress, known for Andrine og Kjell (1952), Vi gifter oss (1951) and Det kunne vært deg (1952). She died on April 29, 1995 in Norway.
biography.name: Inger Marie Andersen

biography.bio: Odd Borg was born on May 26, 1931 in Oslo, Norway as Odd Carl Arthur Borg. He was an actor and assistant director, known for Operasjon Løvsprett (1962), Støv på hjernen (1959) and Selv om de er små (1957). He was married to Anne Borg. He died on November 13, 1965 in Oslo.
biography.name: Odd Borg

biography.bio: John Aamdahl is an actor, known for Støv på hjernen (1959).
biography.name: John Aamdahl

biography.bio: Turid Balke was born on July 25, 1921. She was an actress, known for The 13th Warrior (1999), Karl & Co (1998) and Ugler i mosen (1959). She died on January 5, 2000 in Oslo, Norway.
biography.name: Turid Balke

biography.bio: Arne Bang-Hansen was born on September 8, 1911 in Oslo, Norway. He was an actor, known for Autumn Sonata (1978), Alle tiders kupp (1964) and Leve sitt liv (1982). He died on February 23, 1990 in Norway.
biography.name: Arne Bang-Hansen

biography.bio: Unni Bernhoft was born in 1933 in Oslo, Norway. She is an actress, known for Fools in the Mountains (1957), Millionær for en aften (1960) and Bedre enn sitt rykte (1955). She is married to Bjørn Sand.
biography.name: Unni Bernhoft

biography.bio: Aagot Børseth was born on November 29, 1898 in Oslo, Norway as Aagot Tangen. She was an actress, known for Felix (1921), Selkvinnen (1953) and Bernardas hus (1964). She was married to Henrik Børseth. She died in 1993 in Oslo.
biography.name: Aagot Børseth

biography.bio: Lalla Carlsen was born on August 17, 1889 in Svelvik, Norway as Haralda Petrea Christensen. She was an actress, known for Bussen (1961), Lalla vinner! (1932) and Brudebuketten (1953). She was married to Carsten Carlsen. She died on March 23, 1967 in Oslo, Norway.
biography.name: Lalla Carlsen

biography.bio: Per Christensen was born on July 18, 1934 in Norway. He is known for his work on Hotel Cæsar (1998), Elling (2001) and Tonny (1962). He died on August 26, 2009 in Oslo, Norway.
biography.name: Per Christensen

biography.bio: Much loved Norwegian revue actress,many supporting roles in film-comedies.Best known for her outspoken monologues,but also for her sincerity and warm-hearted performances. Born into a family of actors as daughter of Signe Heide Steen and Harald Steen, she had her first film-part at the early age of 6, on the stage from 1930. For many years she was engaged at Chat Noir and Edderkoppen,both famous revue theaters in Oslo. Her heart-breaking performance in a revue-sketch about two vagrants in a public park,(together with an outstanding Arvid Nilssen) is probably one of the best performances ever done at a Norwegian revue theater! For moviegoers she is best known for her hilarious scooter-drive together with another well-known comedian Willie Hoel,in the comedy: " Støv på hjernen " 1959. She was also very popular as singer of revue-songs, her hit song: " Det hender så mangt på Hovedøen ", were selling more than 50 000 copies! After her husbands death in 1970 she had an absence from the public until 1980, when she had a great comeback at the 70th birthday celebration for a dear friend and colleague;the comedian Leif Juster!
biography.name: Kari Diesen

biography.bio: Wenche Foss was born on December 5, 1917 in Oslo, Norway as Eva Wenche Steenfeldt-Foss Stang. She was an actress, known for Dina (2002), Soyez naturelle (1993) and The Master and His Servants (1959). She was married to Thomas Stang and Alf Scott-Hansen, Jr. She died on March 28, 2011 in Oslo.
biography.name: Wenche Foss

biography.bio: Lillemor Von Hanno is an actress, known for Familien på Borgan (1939) and Støv på hjernen (1959).
biography.name: Lillemor Von Hanno

biography.bio: Sverre Hansen was born on August 24, 1919 in Bergen, Norway. He was an actor and director, known for Eggs (1995), Hunger (1966) and Nine Lives (1957). He died on October 21, 1995.
biography.name: Sverre Hansen

biography.bio: Per Theodor Haugen was born on October 8, 1932 in Norway. He is an actor, known for Liv (1967), Sønner av Norge kjøper bil (1962) and Motforestilling (1972). He is married to Sidsel Sellæg.
biography.name: Per Theodor Haugen

biography.bio: Willie Hoel was born on June 16, 1920 in Oslo, Norway. He was an actor, known for Fools in the Mountains (1957), Millionær for en aften (1960) and Ugler i mosen (1959). He died on June 15, 1986.
biography.name: Willie Hoel
